1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Chloe wants the breast surgery she'd planned four years ago. Weight loss patient Kelly travels to Thailand for a body makeover. And Katie, who's been teased all her life about her nose, hopes rhinoplasty surgery will give her confidence.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Grandmother Ziggy wants a face and neck lift. Aspiring model Nikki wants surgery to correct her uneven breasts and single mum Jayleen hopes a mummy makeover will give her the body confidence to find love.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Michael hopes a tummy tuck will help him find love. Kiara wants breast implants to feel more feminine. Tara hopes surgeons will see the problem that is so obvious to her, and give her an ear pinning operation.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Mum of 3 Lesley hopes a mummy makeover can complete her weight loss journey. Single mum Suzie wants breast surgery to get back out on the dating scene. Bec, who was bullied at school, hopes rhinoplasty can boost her confidence.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Mum of six Susan wants breast surgery to fix a botched nightmare. 58 year old grandmother Deb hopes a mummy makeover will reclaim her youth. And nightclub worker Kiara wants rhinoplasty surgery, as she has hated her nose all her life.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Janice hopes to get a tummy tuck after having three babies. Katie wants breast surgery to boost her confidence at the beach. Jamie travels to Thailand for her second breast operation hoping larger implants will make her feel happy.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: After weight loss Kristen wants a face-lift and breast surgery. Mum of three Emily hopes breast surgery will bring back her body confidence. Single Mum Cheree is seeking a new relationship but feels her uneven breasts are holding her back.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: After weight loss Mum of five Jude is hoping for a mummy makeover. Hairdresser Brooke wants surgery after child rearing left her with deflated breasts. Electrical Foreman Shane plans to get his teeth fixed for his wedding.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Farmer Amelia hopes breast and stomach surgery will bring back passion to her marriage. Aspiring actor Carly wants a smile makeover. Transport coordinator Dee is relying on surgery to repair her deflated breasts after weight loss.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Mum of two Jess wants a mummy makeover before she can marry the man of her dreams. Lifeguard Jody is hoping for rhinoplasty, after being teased about the size of her nose. Bodybuilder Ash wants breast implants so she can feel more feminine.

imdb.plot outline: Follow the emotional journeys of a diverse group of people who travel to Thailand, combining cosmetic surgery with luxury vacations. All with their own needs, insecurities and dreams. It will be a trip that could change their lives forever.
imdb.title: Operation Thailand
plot: Follow the emotional journeys of a diverse group of people who travel to Thailand, combining cosmetic surgery with luxury vacations. All with their own needs, insecurities and dreams. It will be a trip that could change their lives forever.
